label: uncl3131
comment: Code specifying the type of an address.

values.label: Postal address
values.comment: The address is representing a postal address.

values.label: Fiscal address
values.comment: Identification of an address as required by fiscal administrations.

values.label: Physical address
values.comment: The address represents an actual physical location.

values.label: Delivery To Address
values.comment: Address is the address to which delivery is to take place.

values.label: Mail To Address
values.comment: Address is the address to which mail is sent.

values.label: Postbox Address
values.comment: Address is a postal office (PO) box.
